name: Poke Catcher
description:
Explore two different areas with their own unique pokemon for you to catch. When you encounter a pokemon you can attempt to catch it by pressing the spacebar when your line is over the green bar. At any point you can check which pokemon you've caught and which are still out there by opening your poke box.

WASD or Arrow Keys - move

B - open or close your poke box

Escape - leave pokemon encounter

Space - catch pokemon when line is over the green bar
